duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct user research and collaborate with subject matter experts to understand customer and product needs.
Present and pitch ideas to gather key insights on new features/products.
Generate concepts, wireframes, and mockups based on stakeholder feedback.
Engineer performant and scalable front-end interfaces for new ideas/products/features.
Propose and collect key user statistics and indicators to feedback into the design process.
Participate in daily weekday standups to synchronize with other team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field
